name: Avonturen met Berry Biet
description:
Avonturen met Berry Biet is a dutch game made for mobile, though it can be played on a computer.

The game has 3 minigames, which when played in the correct order (when you follow the path) follows a series of events  of cleaning a field, planting and harversting the plants/flowers, sorting the flowers and whacking wheat to create bread.

Though the minigames can be played in any order and how many times you desire.

The game has been made by:

Developers: Rick slor, Jack Hulspas, Giovanny Brugge and Joshua de Bruin.

Artists: Zoe Braam, Tessa Driks and Lotte Braam.
